markdownRemark.html: Second project for the Treehouse Full-Stack JavaScript Techdegree. Single-paged app that displays a list of users that are hard coded into the HTML. It then uses JavaScript to display ten users at a time a paginates it. When the links at the bottom are clicked the corresponding page is displayed. Also alows the user to filter through names with a search bar.

frontmatter.title: List Pagination and Filtering
frontmatter.description: Second project for the Treehouse Full-Stack JavaScript Techdegree
